titleStmt.title: An antidote against an infectious aire. Or a short reply of wel-wishers unto the good and peace of this kingdome; unto the declaration of the 11th of February, 1647.

publicationStmt.date: Printed in the yeare, MDCXLVII. [1647, i.e. 1648]

notesStmt.note: A reply to: A declaration of the Commons of England in Parliament assembled; expressing their reasons and grounds of passing the late resolutions touching no further address or application to be made to the King.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
